amendment.description: An amendment to use the funds made available by this Act under the heading "Border Security Fencing, Infrastructure, and Technology", $50,000,000 shall be for carrying out section 102 of the Illegal Immigration and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

action.text: Mr. Aderholt raised a point of order against the King (IA) amendment (A042). Mr. Aderholt stated that the amendment allocated money for a program not authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
